TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_David_Benoit, title = David_Benoit, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Benoit} }

S.FORM: David Benoit sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1968, byacing te 5 ru 9 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Louisiana, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 203 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 110 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

David Benoit sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas te 1968, byacing te 5 ro 9 ryax qo hintgan nya, kinholan nya ga Looisiana, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 203 konbon kinwagiq nya, 110 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
